actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Health, Education, Labor, and Pensions.

committees.committee: Senate Health, Education, Labor, and Pensions

official_title: A bill to require the Secretary of Health and Human Services to develop a strategy for public health preparedness and response to artificial intelligence threats, and for other purposes.
short_title: Strategy for Public Health Preparedness and Response to Artificial Intelligence Threats

summary.text:
Strategy for Public Health Preparedness and Response to Artificial Intelligence Threats

This bill requires the Department of Health and Human Services to develop a strategy for public health preparedness, response, and biodefense that addresses the risks to national health security posed by the misuse of artificial intelligence, such as biological weapons and viruses and bacteria that are resistant to treatment.
